tests.name: 00597_with_totals_on_empty_set.sql
tests.query: SELECT count() FROM numbers(10) WHERE number = -1 WITH TOTALS FORMAT Vertical;

tests.name: 00597_with_totals_on_empty_set.sql
tests.query: SELECT count() FROM numbers(10) WHERE number = -1 GROUP BY number WITH TOTALS FORMAT Vertical;

tests.name: 00597_with_totals_on_empty_set.sql
tests.query: SELECT number, count() FROM numbers(10) WHERE number = -1 GROUP BY number WITH TOTALS FORMAT Vertical;

tests.name: 00597_with_totals_on_empty_set.sql
tests.query: SELECT groupArray(number) FROM numbers(10) WHERE number = -1 WITH TOTALS FORMAT Vertical;

tests.name: 00597_with_totals_on_empty_set.sql
tests.query: SELECT groupArray(number) FROM numbers(10) WHERE number = -1 GROUP BY number WITH TOTALS FORMAT Vertical;

tests.name: 00597_with_totals_on_empty_set.sql
tests.query: SELECT number, groupArray(number) FROM numbers(10) WHERE number = -1 GROUP BY number WITH TOTALS FORMAT Vertical;
